data.text: @marudi_3ice Hello, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@nanipallares Greetings, in this case, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency. If you booked through our website, please contact our THAI office in your departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR (fees may be applied)
@Mayvatt ทีมงานขอแจ้งว่าท่านจะต้องติดต่อสำนักงาน ณ เมืองต้นทางนะคะ หากเป็นบัตรโดยสารที่เดินทางจากประเทศไทย สามารถติดต่อสำนักงานที่ประเทศไทยได้ค่ะ
@laurieco01 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways? What is your travel route?
@tayI0rjay Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.

data.text: @Nielsrinny We are sorry for the late response. As there are many people contacting THAI ticketing, please wait for a reply from our related department. They will reply back as soon as possible.
@andrew_davis As we have checked, the flight to London on 29 March 2020 was canceled. We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English.
@sunnyppjm Thank you. 💜
@VisLandscape Greetings, the flight has been canceled.

@ASarjam Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to manage your flight. If you booked through our website or our THAI office, please contact email: kulhftg@thaiairways.com.my, kulhatg@thaiairways.com.my

@Moose2826 In e-mail, please provide your email, E-ticket number (the series of numbers starting with 217), workplace, your address, and as well as, the taxpayer's identification number and contact number. (2/2)
@Moose2826 Greetings, you may contact our THAI Ticketing offices nearest to you at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR, or send an email to bkknc.office@thaiairways.com (1/2)

@Keano_94 Hello, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency to manage your flight.
If you booked through our website and have sent an e-mail to our THAI office, please wait for a reply from our officers. They will reply back ASAP.

@NoHagiNoParti Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways? Which e-mail of ours that you sent to?
We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons.

data.text: @abusharplez Greetings, as we are social media team, we do not have authorized to access the information. We suggest that you visit https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q and select "My Booking" to view your flight. Please delete your personal information for security reasons.
@JohnRyanStyle We suggest that you contact our THAI local offices near you for managing your flight. You may find contact details at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR

@RogerPlastow We are sorry for the inconvenience. We suggest that you contact our THAI office in the city of your departure vis e-mail, you may find details at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR for further information.
@RogerPlastow Greetings, for travel departing from Thailand, passengers do not have to present the documents.
@saradomeij We suggest that you contact our THAI Contact Center at +662-356-1111 (24 hours) and press 911 for English assistance or send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@saradomeij May we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@FuerstJosef THAI Prepares to Temporarily Cancel Flights, please visit https://t.co/VfW7C0D14z for further information.

urls.description: Thai Airways has service to 35 countries and offers online flight booking to popular domestic Thailand and International destinations.

data.text: @AdamGar66040763 However, If you booked directly with https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q we suggest you contact our THAI office in your departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR on Mon-Fri in business hours or contact via email for request a refund. (2/2)
@AdamGar66040763 Hello, in case you prefer to request a refund. If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency. (1/2)
@deccccem ทางเจ้าหน้าที่ได้ดำเนินการตอบกลับตามลำดับ จึงอาจทำให้เกิดการล่าช้าในการบริการนะคะ ต้องขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกที่เกิดขึ้น อย่างไรก็ตาม เจ้าหน้าที่จะดำเนินการตอบกลับโดยเร็วที่สุดค่ะ

@NyngTanya ทีมงานขอเรียนแจ้งว่าการยกเลิกและขอคืนเงิน จะเป็นไปตามเงื่อนไขบัตรโดยสารเดิมที่เลือกสำรองไว้ ณ วันที่สำรองบัตรโดยสารนะคะ กรณีเงื่อนไขและข้อกำหนดบนบัตรโดยสารจำเป็นต้องสอบถามกับเอเจนซี่โดยตรงค่ะ

@NyngTanya ในกรณีดังกล่าวแนะนำท่านผู้โดยสารติดต่อเจ้าหน้าที่ เพื่อขอเอกสารยืนยันการยกเลิกเที่ยวบินทางอีเมล contact@service.thaiairways.com พร้อมแจ้งรายละเอียด ชื่อ-นามสกุลผู้โดยสาร (ภาษาอังกฤษ) หมายเลขการจอง 6 หลัก และวัตถุประสงค์ในการติดต่อค่ะ

Stay Home, Stay Safe, Stay Healthy

data.text: @xNatrax_RY Hello, we would like to inform you that foreign travelers (non-Thai nationals) from every departing city in the world to Thailand are required to present health certificates and health insurance documents upon check-in at the airport of departure - https://t.co/EDP9e1SPlI.
@ak1873 We suggest that you check the flight status of your flight travel via https://t.co/mE9sfk3361.
@maejiksyab We would like to inform you that the office has available in office hours 8.00-17.00 Monday-Friday.
@cayatinjain Hello, please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@sophie_hunter_ We suggest that you check the flight status of your flight travel via https://t.co/mE9sfk3361.
